Welcome to the AndrejGround

About me

Being a pioneer in this area, my value is not yet in my skills, but rather in the potential, curiosity, and strong urge to learn new things daily. Creating something from nothing, solving all kind of problems from macro to micro, makes me feel excited and productive.

I find good UI and UX one of the most important aspects of modern programming, so I tend to make my projects as user friendly as I am capable of. Beside that, I am equally interested in learning how back-end works, and it is definitely on my roadmap.

My final goal, as programming is concerned, is to become a full-stack developer.

My portfolio

Coinland

Application for displaying prices and other data of top 100 cryptocurrencies, connected to coinmarketcap.com API, with some features like :
  • - Quick search with listed results
  • - Portfolio with calculated balances
  • - Currency converter
  • - Watchlist - favourites
  • - Night mode
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • Node JS
  • Axios

Share-it

In planning phase

Simple social network, based on some features of twitter like:
  • - Profiles
  • - Followers
  • - Posts
  • - Likes
  • - Comments
  • Angular 8
  • Node JS
